package.name: GroupDocsAnnotation
package.summary: Publish documents, annotate, collaborate and comment with GroupDocs Annotation.
package.description:
The GroupDocs Annotation extension lets you embed documents complete with GroupDocs Annotation into Magento sites.
GroupDocs Annotation is an online application for annotating and commenting on documents. With this powerful tool, you and your colleagues can share and collaborate on documents in real time - annotate, comment and draw - to improve communication and speed up document review. Get input from colleagues in other offices quickly and work together effectively.
GroupDocs Annotation is used to annotate text documents and images so it is useful to editors, writers, designers and their clients, and any team that writes documents. Because GroupDocs Annotation supports many popular text and image file formats, and works in a web browser, it overcomes cross-platform and cross-version issues. Use GroupDocs Annotation as an online Microsoft Word annotator, Excel annotator, Adobe PDF annotator, image annotator and so on.
The extension has an intuitive dashboard of tools that makes it easy to annotate documents. Simply install it to embed GroupDocs Annotation with your documents and publish them to Magento sites. Features
Collaborate on documents in real time. Export annotated documents for editing offline. Comment on text and images. Highlight text, draw freehand or add comments.
